channel.title: Soul wars cape

item.title: Soul wars cape
item.dc:creator: @Woopzpkedu Woopzpkedu
item.description:
@Woopzpkedu wrote:

ok so i added soulwars cape (blue) and it looks like this
here are the ints case 15339: itemDef.modelID = 45565; itemDef.name = "@blu@Blue Cape"; itemDef.modelZoom = 689; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 572; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -6; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 1; itemDef.anInt204 = 14; itemDef.maleEquip1 = 45576; itemDef.femaleEquip1 = 45576; itemDef.groundActions = new String[5]; itemDef.groundActions[2] = "Take"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.actions[4] = "Drop"; break;and how can any1 gime the stats for it for item.cfg?

Read full topic
